question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. ice-cream sign
B. person in blue
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The person in blue is seated at a table in the background, while the ice-cream sign is on a building facade further back, making the person in blue appear closer to the camera than the sign.
